transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha hello good morning sir, se baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Wo aap se kafi time se call kar rahe hai par baat nahi ho pa rahi thi.
Customer: Ha actually kya hai ji mam ho payegi lekin mera kya hai thoda health theek nahi hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: To kab baat karu sir?
Customer: A, mai aapko lagata hu phone thodi der baad hai na?
Executive: Theek hai to aap na mai whatsapp number connect kar rahi hu mujhe ek bar update kar do, theek hai leads ka kuch jo bhi hai consume nahi ho rahi hai na kafi time se.
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: To agar mai bhej deti hu aap kar lo, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's health is not well.

- Buyleads are not being consumed for a while.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect on WhatsApp.

- Customer will check the leads.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, health, whatsapp
